Uses of Class
paint.Action

    • Uses of Action in paint

      Subclasses of Action in paint 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PaintEllipse
      Extends Shape to draw an ellipse on to the graphics context of the canvas
      class  PaintLine
      Extends Shape to draw a line on to the graphics context of the canvas
      class  PaintPlot
      Extends Shape to draw a dot on to the graphics context of the canvas
      class  PaintPolygon
      Extends Shape to draw a polygon on to the graphics context of the canvas
      class  PaintRectangle
      Extends Shape to draw a rectangle on to the graphics context of the canvas
      class  SetFill
      Extends Action to set the fill colour to the specified colour, and prints the instruction of that action
      class  SetPen
      Extends Action to set the pen colour to the specified colour, and prints the instruction of that action
      class  Shape
      Extends Action to create new shape, gets and checks coordinates of the shape
      Methods in paint that return types with arguments of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Action> PaintCanvas.getActions()
      Returns list of actions of the canvas
      Methods in paint with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PaintCanvas.addToActions​(Action action)
      Given an action object, an addition is made to the canvas's current list of actions with the specified action
      Method parameters in paint with type arguments of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PaintCanvas.updateActions​(java.util.ArrayList<Action> actions)
      Updates the actions property.
      void UndoHistoryListView.updateHistoryListView​(java.util.ArrayList<Action> actions)
      Given a list of actions the history list view will update its values with the specified actions.
      void PaintCanvas.updateUndoList​(java.util.ArrayList<Action> newUndoList)
      Given the new undo list the undoActions property is set the the specified values.
